code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'../styles/EditProperty.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditProperty=_ref=>{let{isOpen,close,property,save}=_ref;const[updatedProperties,setUpdatedProperties]=useState({address:"",bedrooms:"",bathrooms:"",garage:"",price:""});useEffect(()=>{if(property){setUpdatedProperties({address:property.address||"",bedrooms:property.bedrooms||"",bathrooms:property.bathrooms||"",garage:property.garage||"",price:property.price||""});}},[property]);if(!isOpen){return null;}const handleEditProperty=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setUpdatedProperties(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=()=>{save(updatedProperties);close();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Edit Property"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Address:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"address",value:updatedProperties.address,onChange:handleEditProperty})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Bedrooms:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"bedrooms",value:updatedProperties.bedrooms,onChange:handleEditProperty})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Bathrooms:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"bathrooms",value:updatedProperties.bathrooms,onChange:handleEditProperty})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Garage:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"garage",value:updatedProperties.garage,onChange:handleEditProperty})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Price:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"price",value:updatedProperties.price,onChange:handleEditProperty})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,children:"Save"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:close,children:"Cancel"})]})]})});};export default EditProperty;
